H0.text: Tessera are the individual pieces that go to make up what. Collage

H1.text: Tessera are the individual pieces that go to make up what. Puzzle

H2.text: Tessera are the individual pieces that go to make up what. Tapestry

H3.text: Tessera are the individual pieces that go to make up what. MOSAIC

A4.text: A mosaic is a pattern or image made of small regular or irregular pieces of colored stone, glass or ceramic, held in place by plaster/mortar, and covering a surface.

A5.text: A tessera (plural: tesserae, diminutive tessella) is an individual tile, usually formed in the shape of a square, used in creating a mosaic.
